headline: TD Cowen Lifts Target on Applied Materials (AMAT) to $315, Names It a “Top 2026 Idea”
summary: Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) is one of the AI Stocks on the Market’s Radar. On December 4, TD Cowen raised its price target on the stock to $315.00 from $260.00 while maintaining a “Buy” rating. Firm analysts have named this chip manufacturing equipment firm their “Top 2026 Idea” driven by structural growth in DRAM and Foundry […]

headline: Moat Stocks Gain On Health Care Strength, Tech Slowdown
summary:
Moat Index gained 1.53% in November, supported by health care and broader market participation.
Merck and Amgen were top Moat Index contributors, benefiting from strong demand and pipelines.

headline: 3 Unpopular Stocks That Concern Us
summary: Wall Street has issued downbeat forecasts for the stocks in this article. These predictions are rare - financial institutions typically hesitate to say bad things about a company because it can jeopardize their other revenue-generating business lines like M&A advisory.
